1377: Yda was born in Uterechse straet in 1377.
1378: Lost mother at the age of 1.
Ivone took care of Yda since Yda was 2.
1385: Lost sibling Gloria in 1385 when Gloria was 15.
1389: Lost sibling Machtilden in 1389 when Machtilden was 20.
1390: Got married to Piak at age 14 in 1390.
Yda moved to Bloemendaelse straet.C.2 after marriage.
1391: Gave birth to Yda in 1391 at age 14.
1392: Gave birth to Willai in 1392 at age 15.
1393: Gave birth to Cats in 1393 at age 16.
Lost son Willai when Willai was 2 years old.
1394: Gave birth to Rabburgis in 1394 at age 17.
1395: Gave birth to Gheesen in 1395 at age 18.
1396: Lost father at the age of 19.
1399: Gave birth to Radulphus in 1399 at age 22.
